description: Main topics of this course are measure theory on the real line and the Lebesgue integral (an improved version of the standard Riemann integral from calculus). Prerequisite: Mathematics 244, or permission of instructor. Offered in 2001-02 and alternate years.
name: Real Analysis
prerequisites: Mathematics 244, or permission of instructor. Offered in 2001-02 and alternate years.
